mapper.select: select e.id,e.`name`,e.`code` from t_noncar_plan_element e left join t_noncar_plan_element_group g on e.group_id = g.id and g.category = 'compute' left join t_noncar_plan_info p on ((p.custom_element = 1 and biz_type = 'plan' and g.biz_id = p.id) or (p.custom_element = 0 and biz_type = 'strategy' and g.biz_id = p.strategy_id)) where p.id = #{planId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and g.category = 'compute'
